roleset.name: compete
roleset.note: VIE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls battle-36.4-1. (from vie.01-v)

example.name: sufficient explanation
example.text: Big U.S. distillers are fiercely vying for this market, which grew to $77 million last year from $33 million in 1987, according to government figures.
example.arg: for this market, which grew to $77 million last year from $33 million in 1987, according to government figures
